comment: 4 peer graded papers. Quizzes from book. Supposed to be a journal  but halfway through he stopped checking and gave no more grades. The only thing taught is his resume and educational history. Avoid speaking during discussions. Racially motivated and name calling. Lives up to textbooks name 'Everything's an Argument'

WORST TEACHER EVER.  I may not be the best at grammar and that's all he grades for. He doesn't teach anything. Hes very rude. He talks about his doctoral degree which is African American studies. He says everything is about race. This is not a debate class its supposed to be composition. He sucks run far away. Hes a LIAR, NO RESPECT, VERY MAD HERE

He is a very easy professor, and if you know anything about writing you'll get an A. There are only 4 papers and extra credit quizzes. If you are looking for a class where you actually learn, take another professor. He's very closed minded and brings race into a lot of things! I would not take him again.

This is the easiest class on earth to take. I got a 96 with little effort. If you need an easy A, take this class; I did to boost my GPA! If you want to actually learn and develop your English skills, don't take this class.

EASY A! 3 papers and 1 final paper. Quizzes do not count, they're extra credit points that can be added to your papers. In class we usually did journals or peer editing and held class discussions over those activities. He's a nice guy and if you can punctuate and use correct grammar, you'll make an A on every paper! I haven't made less than a 95.

Easy A. 3 Papers and a Final paper. All the quizes you take dont count. The best quiz gets added to your lowest paper so very easy to get an A. He likes to talk about random things during journals but overall is a funny guy and is an easy class. Will help you if you ask. You wont know your grade though until end of semester so try to keep up.

If you want a class with little to no work, then this is the class for you. Overall, there's three essays and then a final paper. He grades the essay solely on grammatical error and whether or not you did the assignment correctly. There's also journals based on current issues or whatever he wants to talk about. We discuss it and then leave.

Simple as cake. He talked more about Kim Kardashian and the Lakers than he did about English. Showed up late to class multiple times, sometimes even thirty minutes late. If you don't want any challenge than this is the right professor for you.
no tests. lots of compositions but none of them were tough. if you can write about yourself, take him. if you cant, learn to talk about yourself and then take him. dont really need any of his books

Easy easy easy! All we did was write journals, and he commented, and we left. ALL SEMESTER! 3 papers, doesn't even read them for real, only checks for punctuation and stuff. No final, but he does show up late which gets annoying. Plus, if you miss 6 classes, you fail.

Easiest class ever. Felt like a middle school English class. We did a journal every class over a topic he thinks of based on personal experiences or current problems. The whole class shares what they wrote and he comments. Sometimes offending. Only three easy papers written about yourself and your major. No final. Same as his ENGL 1101 class.
Does not teach any actual material and simply goes on and on about whatever it is he wants to talk about Do not take
